conbody.p: Hive Query executorqueryYou can use the Hive Query executor to execute any valid Hive or Impala query. In the query, you can use fields or attributes available in the event record passed to the executor. The structure of the event record is specific to the stage that generates the event record.

Typically, you would pass events from the Hive Metastore destination to the Hive Query executor. The Hive Metastore destination generates event records with the following attributes and fields:this should be a table or something that can be conrefed from the Hive Metastore doc.
For information about other event records, see the documentation for the record-generating stage.
